tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
Our marriage has lasted about 10 years and we've tried many options in Bengaluru for conceiving a child. There was no success.

As a patient, finding a gynecologist who not only possesses exceptional medical expertise but also exudes warmth and compassion can be a daunting task. However, my search came to a gratifying end when I discovered Dr. Akhila Anand.


From the moment I stepped into the Hospital, I was greeted by a friendly and efficient staff, setting the tone for a positive experience. 


Dr. Akhila Anand herself is a consummate professional, ************* * ***** ** ********* *** expertise that instilled confidence in me from the outset. She took the time to thoroughly listen to my concerns, asking pertinent questions and addressing each with care and attention to detail. Her ability to communicate complex medical information in a clear and understandable manner was truly commendable, leaving me feeling informed and empowered in my healthcare decisions.

What truly sets Dr. Akhila Anand apart, however, is her genuine concern for her patients' well-being. Beyond just treating symptoms, she takes a holistic approach, considering not only the physical but also the emotional aspects of health. Her empathy and bedside manner are second to none, making even the most sensitive discussions feel comfortable and respectful.

During examinations and procedures, Dr. Akhila Anand maintained a reassuring demeanor, ensuring I felt comfortable and supported throughout. Her gentle and skilled approach inspired confidence, making what could have been an anxiety-inducing experience surprisingly manageable.


We 100% recommend Dr. Akhila Anand. She is not just a competent gynecologist but a compassionate healthcare provider who genuinely cares for the well-being of her patients. My experience under her care has been nothing short of exceptional, and I am grateful to have her as my trusted medical partner. 

I'm conceiving for the first time now and I'm excited and nervous at the same time. I'm excited to see what the future holds for me and nervous about the challenges I'll have to face. I can't wait to meet my baby.

If you're in search of a gynecologist who combines expertise with compassion, look no further than Dr. Akhila Anand.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor explains all the process involved in the treatment and if you are facing any problems she is easily reachable and make us think positive. I am very happy with the treatment and within 3 months in the 1st attempt I got conceived. Very happy and satisfied with her treatment. She has lots of patience to listen to our problems and she will make us to understand why the problems are rised and why it's so complicated and how to come out of the problems and she tells whats the  best way to treat our problems.She has come up with very Rich Experience on her Professional services and she holds the professional Ethics to treat the patient.I recommend others for better treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Before Completion of our first year of Marriage I thought of giving good news to our family, But till 9th month we dint got result, Then I visited Thamara Hospital for the treatment of Irregular Periods, On first visit I met Dr.Akila Anand and explained my problem she clearly guided me and started treatment on day one itself and with in a month my period became regular and again I missed my period!!!! , On our First wedding Anniversary we gave good news to our family as we thought!!! Thanks to Dr Akhila Madam and Team Thamara for the reason of our happiness. We Highly recommend for who are facing any issue relates to Pregnancy. Everything is possible with these highly qualified professionals.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Hi.. I am really happy about the treatment given at Tamara hospital. We are happy to announce that "we are pregnant " I am in my 10weeks . After 5years of marriage I got conceived but due to lack of growth in baby I wanted to go under medical termination.  Later after a year we got to know about hospital Tamara who gives good treatment for infertility and pregnancy care.  We met DR.  Akila anand who was really caring and friendly in explaining about the treatment.  She was there for me all through the procedures.  I would like to thank her for preparing myself to get  conceive.   
I heartily recommend Tamara and Dr.  Akila for the treatment of infertility,  pregnancy and women health care.  All the staffs and nurses provides caring services .   
Thank you Dr.  Akila for all your care,  concern and cooperation throughout my journey of treatment and now in my pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review: I am very pleased with my experience at Tamara, especially Dr.Akhila Anand.  It was good to be treated with professionalism and care. Dr. Akhila  and all the other employees of the Tamara made me feel that I was in safe hands. I appreciate Dr. Akhilas patience and willingness to answer all the questions/doubts I had during the treatment process.I consulted Dr. Akhila for my infertility problem and in my first attempt I am conceived. I am very happy and thank-full to Dr. Akhila.I was beyond impressed with my experience at Dr.Akhilas office. My first contact with Dr. Akhila , and I was completely impressed by her positive attitude, friendly behavior and immense patience and professionalism in the treatment process. The first point of contact is crucial as it gives a positive vibe to the patient. Dr. Akhila has an immense experience in the area of infertility with excellent attitude towards patient handling.I highly recommend Dr. Akhila.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Akhila is very friendly.  Half of the mental pressure reduses only by her cool temper..her advise is satisfactory... Dr. Neha is also a friendly Doctor Who checks BP and weight to support Dr. Akhila to reduce waiting hours.
But one thing upsets me is.. No "first come first service system"... I suggest  staff members can have discussion with the Doctor once patients are attended.. 
Those who come last are attended first,  and those who come first are attended later..I came to Tamara at 10:30am and left around 1:30pm..3hrs. They don't keep track of this... Staff members need to be more professional... 

Thank you...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After one and half year of marriage,my wife being upset of not getting pregnancy.So, we visited Dr Akhila madam inTamara Hospital,and undergone basic check up, got the result that we are normal,but still failing to carry. My wife was so hesitant to speak her all problems, but Dr Akhila made her so friendly and comfortable that she became so expressive cleared all her myths about pregnancy,doctor helped us on how to get pregnancy naturally. In 2 months, By regular visits and proper counselling and by natural method and IUI treatment we got the result. She is happily carrying her first child.We are so thankful to Dr Akhila *** *** ***** ********* *** ****** ************ ** ***She is very friendly and cheerful doctor, one would feel free to share even the silliest of confusion or doubt one has, my experience has been excellent so far !!,Would definitely recommend her if anyone is looking for a good doctor.Thank you madam....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is very rude and unfriendly which makes it difficult to discuss problems. *** **** ***  ** ******* **** ** *********** ***** ***** ** ********* ** **** *** They made me wait for more than an hour at the clinic despite having a prior appointment and showing up on time. The doctor asked me to come back the following day for a scan and when I did, she said that she can’t confirm anything since their scanner is a 2D scanner and asked me to get the scanning done from some other place. ** *** **** *** ****** ******* ********* she shouldn’t have called me back the following day for a scan and charged me for it. I wish I could give 0 stars for this experience. I really wouldn’t recommend this place 👎👎

context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),

By God Grace we met Dr. Akhila Madam for Infertility Treatment(IVF) for us she is a God sent Angel. She is experienced doctor with great expertise knowledge and friendly wonderful doctor, she can handle High Risk pregnancy in difficult phases. Now I became mother and recommend every one should go and meet Dr.Akhila Anand atleast once so that you will get confidence on you becoming Mother with delivering Healthy Baby.
I am personally very thankful to Dr. Akhila Madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was trying since 14yrs to conceive.. my age 34yrs .. visited many hospital for treatment .. dint get any result..finally i met dr akhila anand at tamara hoslital for same issue.. she explained everything and i followed madam advise..i got a positive result in first attempt only.. thank you so much madam for completing our family..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Our heartful thanks to Dr. Akhila Anand who treated us infertility and made us to Parenthood within 1.2 years from the date we visited her. Her excellence way of treating in a friendly manner was made us to deliver a healthy baby boy. Again thanks a lot Madam for fulfilled our dream of parenthood and making us happy in our life.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
First and foremost our heartfelt thanks to Dr.Akhila Anand.
We got a positive result within 6 months by visiting Dr.Akhila. In addition Dr.Akhila has always been very responsive to questions and concerns. She always kept her word and followed up on all unasnswered questions... 
Her positive talks and confidence towards our treatment helped us to gain more positivity.. We would like to recommend her to the couples who are trying for babies...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: More than 6yrs we were trying for baby..consulted 4to 5 doctors for same issue .. Finally we met dr akhila anand and got positive hopes..well experienced and good doctor .. Finally We got positive result..very happy and i would recommend to consult dr akhila for any infertility issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Since  we came to tamara hospital with married life of  18 years with 2 cycles failled and 3rd time  we got sucess with Dr Akhila madam  who treated my wife.  now she is 7 months pregnant with twins.. we are great full to Dr Akhila. We recommend all the infertility couples to consult dr akhila for treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My first IVF was done by Dr. Akhila Anand. It resulted success. After 7 years of marriage, happiness blossomed in our life  .  Words are not enough to appreciate Dr. Akhila madam. Dr. Neha and Akhila madam are  also so friendly, they explains diet . I have recommended my friends too. Staffs and Nurses at Tamara hospital are very professional . Smile on each staffs of Tamara Hospital brings positive vibes in us . All the Best to Tamara hospital Management, you are doing great. Keep going

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
WE Met Dr akhila when  WE were  Going through a complex situation... Multiple ivf failures ...i was trying to conceive since 18yrs...
Dr akhila and the center were extreamly caring,very dedicated, positive oriented, friendly and professional.i thank for the support and cooperation.  My wife is happily carrying her first child. Happy with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am madappa i visited so many hospital in bangalore for ivf treatment, we dint get result 
so  i visited tamara hospital rajaji nagar. There we met dr akhila mam and we got hope and trust , we got a successful treatment in 1st attempt only and my wife delivered baby boy after 11years of our married life .. now our life is color full and complete. special thanks to dr akhila madam. .. I thank tamara team ..i am really very happy😊😊😊 I recommend everyone to take madam consultation once and get successful treatment..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was referred to Dr. Akhila by my friend, we were planning for a baby from one year but because of irregular cycles I was not getting conceived.
Later I told my problem and doc started our treatment soon within 3months Doc suggested to do IUI treatment and treatment was successfully done and I got conceived.
That was the happiest moment in our life's.
Me and my husband are Thank ful to Akhila mam
I would definitely recommend to consult Akhila doc for positive and quick results.

Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We have met Dr Akhila for my infertility case for which we have been suffering for a long .I had a a failure in my 1st IVF cycle and unexpectedly I got a chance to meet Dr Akhila .After meeting her I got a day of hopes and confidence through her experience and dedication towards her profession .I really got convinced by her excellent way of treatment and understanding the health issues of patient .I am pregnant now which is really a dream come true for me and my husband and especially my family .

We strongly recommend Dr Akhila Anand for anyone who is looking for a considerate doctor for their infertility treatment .

Thanks 
Chithra

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
1. Though we scheduled appointment well in advance. We had to wait for one n half hour to meet the doctor. 

2.Toilets cleanliness was not good.

3. Inside the consultation room privacy is not maintained. Every now and then assistants would enter or stand by door. Doors were not closed properly and all the discussion could be heard sitting outside. *** **** ******** *********** *** ************** ************
4. Sometime we saw two different patients were consulted in parallel. Even when we entered consultation room. Previous patient was in examination section and discussion could be heard easily.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Actually we were very badly need of baby, our marriage life was very good  but with out baby, we visited nearly 3 to 4 hospitals, in one hospital we did 3 ivf procedures but could not succeed,  fortunately we visited TAMARA hospital last year, luckily  we met Dr. Akila mam, she treated nicely in the initial stages, somehow we convinced her advices and followed strict conditions, atlast we succeeded  now  my wife is two months pregnant,  may god bless Dr.AKILA mam nicely. most excellent  DR  ever seen in life 🙏🙏👌👌.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We were referred to this hospital through my SIL who also underwent IVF treatment and was successful.... Dr.Neha ma'am introduced us to Dr.Akhila ma'am and since then my sisters treatment procedure was explained step by step it took 6 months to get positive result, but its worth waiting time because, to achive that result Dr.Akhila ma'am gave us all positive hope and boosted us with confidence level and yes my sister and we are happy today after 7 years of marriage life my sister is convinced and we are all happy to see blissful smile on her face... Thank you so ma'am

tags: Wait time,
review: I recommend Dr.Akhila mam,  she is friendly with all patients and  I got conceived within 4 months Iam happy with treatment.
